panels.visual: Arriving at balcony garden Lush impossible greenery Warm sunlight despite snow
Marivielle serving hot tea at garden table Worried expression beneath smile
panels.dialogue: Marivielle: "I'm so glad you're here. The plants have been... troubled."

panels.visual: Close on Marivielle's face, serious expression, garden background
panels.dialogue: Marivielle: "A noble came through late at night. With drow I'd never seen. They spoke of 'keys' and 'alignment' and 'lenses.'"
Prismor: "This noble - what did he look like?" Marivielle: "Fashionable but cold. Militaristic coat. Crimson emblem. Chin always up."
